revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Distortion World |image = [[File:Distortion World.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Distortion World |tokens = 82,500 |location = East of Route 214 }} '''Distortion World''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 922,100 |- | Boss || 4,280,000 |- | Giratina (altered) || 8,880,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Golbat * Gastly * Haunter * Duskull * Chingling * Bronzor * Chimecho * Dusclops (boss) * Bronzong (boss) * Giratina (altered) (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | [[Token Collector]] || 33% |}
